Array: The shrine you saw, it's that thing over there?
This is how we reach the ones who can grant access to the Sea of Stars.
Did your vision contain anything about how to get to it?
Not really, I just know deep down that we have everything we need.
Quite impressive. How did you know?
The Oracle of Tides... he said I could "mend the connection."
And we get to walk on it now! Come on!
